query:
/*+ NoHashJoin(ml t) NoHashJoin(mk ml t k) NoMergeJoin(k mk ml t mc) NoHashJoin(k mc mk ml t ct) NoMergeJoin(ct k mc mk ml t cn) */ select min(cn.name) AS from_company,
min(mc.note) AS production_note,
min(t.title) AS movie_based_on_book
from movie_link AS ml
inner join title AS t
on ml.movie_id = t.id AND t.production_year > 1950
inner join movie_keyword AS mk
on ml.movie_id = mk.movie_id AND t.id = mk.movie_id
inner join keyword AS k
on mk.keyword_id = k.id AND k.keyword IN ('sequel',
'revenge',
'based-on-novel')
inner join movie_companies AS mc
on mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND ml.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND t.id = mc.movie_id AND mc.note IS NOT NULL
inner join company_type AS ct
on mc.company_type_id = ct.id AND ct.kind <> 'production companies' AND ct.kind IS NOT NULL
inner join company_name AS cn
on mc.company_id = cn.id AND cn.country_code <> '[pl]'
inner join link_type AS lt
on lt.id = ml.link_type_id;
